title: Terms of Service
welcome_message: Welcome to Addrezza, a digital GPS-enabled home address management platform.
intro_text: These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your access to and use of Addrezza's services, website, mobile applications, and any other related products or services (collectively, the “Service”) provided by Addrezza Inc. (“Addrezza,” “we,” “our,” or “us”). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms, which form a legally binding agreement between you and Addrezza. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Service.
key_points_intro: The terms and conditions of Addrezza are much more detailed, but here are the key points you should know about:
key_point_1: All Addrezza platforms (website www.addrezza.com and applications mobile and web) are all designed to be used free of charge both for personal and business address uses.
key_point_2: The KARE ONE is the primary Addrezza device designed to serve as your home address, and can be used by anyone anywhere in the world.
key_point_3: You can use your Addrezza address as your official home address. You own your address and do not need to enter in a license agreement with Addrezza (“us”). Just activate your address, and you can share it with whomever and wherever you want.
